oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-08-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 31, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Chet Atkins, Rod Brasfield, Stringbean, Marvin Hughes, Millie Kirkham, and the Southlanders. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 934th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rod Brasfield; Johnnie & Jack; Stringbean; Ferlin Husky; Marvin Hughes; Millie Kirkham; Southlanders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ferlin Husky introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Prince Albert commercial (Ferlin Husky, Johnnie & Jack) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ferlin Husky introduces Johnnie & Jack -- Love Fever (Johnnie & Jack) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Stringbean -- The Shotgun Boogie (Stringbean) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Make Me Live Again (Ferlin Husky, Marvin Hughes, Millie Kirkham, Southlanders) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States.
